realtimeweb.businesssearch.regular

Class BusinessSearch

  • Object
    • realtimeweb.businesssearch.regular.BusinessSearch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractBusinessSearch

    public class BusinessSearch
extends Object
implements AbstractBusinessSearch
    The StructuredBusinessSearch class is used to connect to the Yelp service and retrieve data as well-structured classes. All data is returned asynchronously - your program will continue to run while the data is being fetched, and the result will be sent to a callback function that you specify.

    There will only be one instance of the StructuredBusinessSearch, because it follows the Singleton pattern. In order to use it, first get the instance of the class. 
     StructuredBusinessSearch sbs = StructuredBusinessSearch.getInstance();
    You can immediately use the service offline, or you can connect to the online service: 
     sbs.connect("key", "secret", "token", "secrettoken");
    To stop using your connection: 
     sbs.disconnect();
    Author:
    acbart

      • getBusinessData

        public void getBusinessData(Business incompleteBusiness,
                   BusinessDataListener listener)
        Given a Business, fills in any data that might be missing from it. This is useful for the Businesses returned in a SearchResponse by a searchBusinesses(realtimeweb.businesssearch.main.BusinessQuery, realtimeweb.businesssearch.regular.BusinessSearchListener).
        Parameters:
        incompleteBusiness -
        listener -

      • getBusinessData

        public void getBusinessData(String businessId,
                   BusinessDataListener listener)
        Returns data about a business given its businessId (which is a sequence of characters, symbols, and numbers, e.g. "I_7cQmHxx6LokP9yr7Fx-w").
        Parameters:
        businessId - A string identifying the business.
        listener - a callback function that will consume the data (or error) about the business.

      • searchBusinesses

        public void searchBusinesses(BusinessQuery query,
                    BusinessSearchListener listener)
        Queries the Yelp service for businesses that match the given BusinessQuery. Returns the data (or error) through the listener object.
        Parameters:
        query - A BusinessQuery object
        listener - A listener object that should contain methods for handling the data and, optionally, any errors.

      • connect

        public void connect(String consumerKey,
           String consumerSecret,
           String token,
           String tokenSecret)
        Establishes a connection to the online Business Search service. dataservice. This requires an internet connection. Requires registration information from Yelp. To get your key go to http://www.yelp.com/developers
        Specified by:
        connect in interface AbstractBusinessSearch
        Parameters:
        consumerKey -
        consumerSecret -
        token -
        tokenSecret -

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Establishes that Business Search data should be retrieved locally. This does not require an internet connection.

        If data is being retrieved locally, you must be sure that your parameters match locally stored data. Otherwise, you will get nothing in return.
        Specified by:
        disconnect in interface AbstractBusinessSearch
        Parameters:
        local -
